title: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka??: Sing for You
title_english: Is the Order a Rabbit?? OVA
title_japanese: ご注文はうさぎですか?? ~Sing For You~
title_synonyms: Gochuumon wa Usagi desu ka? OVA
synopsis: Chino Kafuu returns to Rabbit House with a horrified look on her face. When questioned by her friends, she explains to them that she had just agreed to sing the solo section of a song for her class’ graduation ceremony. Although they congratulate their friend on her important role, Chino reveals that she has stage fright, but is determined to overcome it before the ceremony takes place.With the support of her friends and special training from Rize Tedeza, will Chino be able to overcome her stage fright? Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka??: Sing for You is a wholesome and heart-warming short story featuring Chino and the other girls from the cafe. [Written by MAL Rewrite]

Prequel.name: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka??: Dear My Sister

Sequel.name: Gochuumon wa Usagi Desu ka? Bloom

ending_themes: "Gin no Spoon: Blend of Memory" (銀のスプーン ~Blend of Memory~)" by Saki (Nana Mizuki), Chino (Inori Minase)
